summary: This will easily divorce you from your current spouse without having to kill him/her.
descriptionHtml:
; Divorce Script Mod for Skyrim
; By Draxima
;
; If you have any problems with this mod
; just email me draxima@gmail.com.
; Step one press ~ console
; Step two seleted your Spouse.
; Step three type bat divorceus
removefac 51596
player.removefac c6472
resetquest 74793
resetquest 21382
setstage 74793 10
; Done
; You should beable to marry someone else by
; Putting on the Neckless of Mara.
author: Draxima
